name: Split Personality Doctor: Prologue
description:
A doctor in a small town suddenly gained the ability to shrink his body, so he shrunk his body into various patients' bodies and treated diseases by eliminating the virus in the patients' bodies.


  • Dominating Summon Combat: Although the Doctor himself has some attack ability, he mainly needs to fight through summons.
  • Cooperate with summons to trigger skills.

  • Each summon has its own special attack mode, which can be upgraded and synthesized to create a more powerful summon.

  • The Doctor can choose a base weapon, and different summons will activate different characteristics of the weapon, such as ejection, explosion, burning, freezing, etc.

  • Easy to use (only need to control the direction of movement), super refreshing, roguelikes, fast pace (no more than 30 minutes per game).
  • Hundreds of items and summons, build different combinations.
